usage: Used as free weights for gym and home exercise, strength training, and fitness workouts.
key_features: Hexagonal Shape Keeps Dumbbells in Place
Thick vinyl coating for comfortable and non-slip feel
Hexagon shaped edges for easy storage and prevent rolling
ai_description: A pair of compact green hex dumbbells with a smooth neoprene coating and white “KAKSS 3 KG” markings on the ends. The hexagonal heads prevent rolling, and the slightly textured surface offers a non-slip grip. Shown in clean, minimal lifestyle and infographic layouts.
target_audience: People performing gym or home workouts who want 3 kg dumbbells for strength and fitness training.
product_name: Kakss Neoprene Dumbbells Pair Green Hex Dumbbell Weights 3 kg & 3 kg
